--- category: release-notes version: 2.8.0 title: Update Deployment workflow. breaking-changes: potential-breaking-changes: removed the !important declaration on the .block-grid__item inline-block style fixed: - text-wrapping in the messaging component - moved deprecated messaging component into deprecated.scss added: - a prefixed version of the .flex class - icons for the Apple News and RSS social buttons deprecated: - docs - they have now been moved to the solid_docs project - dist files - these are now published with the package - flex - moved the non-prefixed version to deprecated.scss release-notes: This release is the start of a new deployment process which sees the solid documentation moved to mono/solid_docs. ---
